item.description:
Let's visit The De Cordova Museum and Ourdoor Sculpture Park today. There are several ongoing interesting exhibits and temporary ones also. There's a wonderful museum store and also a cafe where they serve light food and cold drinks.

UPDATE: JUST ADDED BY REQUEST- this is a great place to picnic! So, I am adding another pot luck
picnic. f you'd like to participate, please bring a chair/blanket to sit on, a food item to share,
and your own water/ beverage. Since it's pot luck, we will manage without a list. I'll provide
utensils. plates, trash bags, etc. Let's hope for a nice day!

The Sculpture park is an event in itself! At 1pm there is a tour although some may want to do it on their own. If I could pick any place I really enjoy, the Sculpture Park is one of my favorites!

COST: $12.00 adult
$ 8.00 senior
www.decordove.org - for info about the museum and it's exhibits

***NOTE:Make sure to wear comfy shoes as there will be outdoor walking. A meeting point will be designated within the visitor's parking lot. This is an adult only shared event with 3-4other meetup groups. RAIN OR INTENSE HEAT MAY CANCEL THIS EVENT. PLEASE MAKE SURE TO CHECK FOR UPDATES BEFORE HEADING OUT.
VERY IMPORTANT : At an event of this kind, due to the type of venue, members usually break off into smaller groups. If this is a problem for anyone? This may not be the best event for you to attend.

I hope to see you there
_Jo
item.how_to_find_us: We will all meetup just outside the museum store. Just off the visitor's lot
item.name: A Day At The DeCordova Museum and Outdoor Sculpture Park
